description: Medics at one of the capital's busiest hospitals tell of services on the brink and becoming infected.
title: Coronavirus: Madrid¡¯s medical heroes in the fight of their lives
title_page: Coronavirus: Madrid¡¯s medical heroes in the fight of their lives - BBC News
maintext: From the second week of the crisis, PPE became scarce, says Dr Trujillo. Respirator masks ran out so they had to use two surgical masks as an alternative. "We doctors can stand back from patients, so it's more important for nurses."
